Others: Paul George suffered a hyperextended left knee during the preseason game against the Atlanta Hawks and did not return for the second half.
The injury occurred in the second quarter of the game.
George played 12 minutes and scored 8 points, had 2 rebounds, 1 assist, and 1 steal before the injury.
The Sixers have high expectations for the upcoming regular season after falling short in the playoffs throughout the Embiid era.
Joel Embiid is already out for the remainder of the preseason with left knee management.
The Sixers begin the 2024-25 season at home against the Milwaukee Bucks on Oct. 23.
